resources.string: ALERT! I might be in danger, if I do not text back in 5 minutes please call an emergency line.
I was in this location, %1$s \\n at this time: %2$s \\n Sent by safe.ly
safe.ly let\'s you send an alert message in situations of danger to all your chosen emergency contacts instantly, with the press of the safe.ly button.
Just add your favorite emergency contacts stored in your phone.
When you feel in danger, keep the app open and press the button for at least 4 seconds. Your contacts will be alerted with your location and time sent.
Don\'t forget to text them back if it was a false alarm! \n Tap anywhere to start.
Hey, check out this app to help you stay safe.
An app to help you get places safe.
There are no contacts yet. Use the add button in the main screen
